TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ChangeFeedMode extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Base class for the change feed mode .
Docs.remarks: Use one of the static constructors to generate a ChangeFeedMode option.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property FullFidelity As ChangeFeedMode

Docs.summary: Creates a to receive notifications for creations, deletes, as well as all intermediary snapshots for updates.
Docs.value: A to receive notifications for insertions, updates, and delete operations.
Docs.remarks: A container with a configured is required. The delete operations will be included only within the configured retention period. When enabling full fidelity mode you will only be able to process change feed events within the retention window configured in the change feed policy of the container. If you attempt to process a change feed after more than the retention window an error(Status Code 400) will be returned because the events for intermediary updates and deletes have vanished. It would still be possible to process changes using mode even when configuring a full fidelity change feed policy with retention window on the container and when using Incremental mode it doesn't matter whether your are out of the retention window or not - but no events for deletes or intermediary updates would be included.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Incremental As ChangeFeedMode

Docs.summary: Creates a to receive incremental item changes.
Docs.value: A to receive incremental item changes.
Docs.remarks: Incremental mode includes item creations and updates, not deletions.
